security_assessment.override_purpose: DKIM email authentication setup for Zoho Mail
security_assessment.security_impact: POSITIVE - Enhanced email security and deliverability
security_assessment.risk_level: LOW - DKIM records do not affect website functionality
security_assessment.recommendation: PROCEED - Override is necessary for professional email security

technical_analysis.dkim_function: Digital signature verification for outgoing emails
technical_analysis.wildcard_impact: Only affects email authentication, not website subdomains

agent_consensus.general_patton: Execute override - email security mission critical
